channel.title: GitHub Trending - Rust (Monthly)

item.title: 🦀 Michael-A-Kuykendall/shimmy (2341 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: Michael-A-Kuykendall

📝 Repository: Michael-A-Kuykendall/shimmy

📄 Descrizione: ⚡ Python-free Rust inference server — OpenAI-API compatible. GGUF + SafeTensors, hot model swap, auto-discovery, single binary. FREE now, FREE forever.
